item.title: Apple’s ELEGNT framework could make home robots feel less like machines and more like companions
item.description: Apple introduces ELEGNT, allowing robots to convey intentions, emotions and attitudes through movement, — rather than just functional tasks.

item.title: OpenAI responds to DeepSeek competition with detailed reasoning traces for o3-mini
item.description: By showing a more detailed version of the chain of thought of o3-mini, OpenAI is closing the gap with DeepSeek-R1.

item.title: From 220M data points to revenue: How AI is transforming sports entertainment ROI
item.description: A new AI-powered platform is already helping NFL and other sports teams better engage with fans and optimize revenue potential.

item.title: GitHub Copilot previews agent mode as market for agentic AI coding tools accelerates
item.description: GitHub Copilot is getting more autonomous with new agent mode and the promise of Project Padawan as competition in AI coding space grows.

item.title: Hugging Face brings ‘Pi-Zero’ to LeRobot, making AI-powered robots easier to build and deploy
item.description: Pi0 is a groundbreaking AI model that helps robots understand natural language commands, potentially revolutionizing industrial automation.
